features: Dynamic Resource Scaling: Adjust quotas based on system load or user preferences.
Fairness Policies: Implement round-robin or weighted-fair scheduling for queued queries.
Preemption: Allow high-priority queries to preempt lower-priority ones.
Rich Query Metadata: Track user, session, and context for each query.
Search & Tagging: Allow users to search, filter, and tag queries in history.
Visual Analytics: Provide charts for query rates, errors, durations, and resource usage.
Session Snapshots & Restore: Allow users to save and restore session state.
Session Sharing: Enable collaborative sessions or export/import of session data.
Session Expiry/Auto-Cleanup: Automatically clean up idle or expired sessions.
Audit Logging: Log all significant actions and events for traceability.
Health Checks: Expose health endpoints or events for monitoring.
Self-Healing: Detect and recover from failed queries, resource exhaustion, or corrupted state.
Live Notifications: Push real-time updates to the UI for query status, resource changes, etc.
Customizable Policies: Let users configure quotas, retention, and history options via settings.
Undo/Redo: Support undo/redo for session and query actions.
Plugin System: Allow third-party modules to hook into events or extend manager logic.
API Exposure: Provide a public API for external tools or scripts to interact with the managers.
Role-Based Access: Restrict actions based on user roles or permissions.
Audit Trails: Track who did what and when for compliance.
Batch Processing: Optimize for bulk query/history operations.
Async/Parallel Execution: Support parallel query execution where safe.
